quest_desc.qdesc: 독 주머니(400091) 아르젠타 의뢰 수락 죽음의 분지 1번 맵에서 데이비드와 대화. 죽음의 분지 2번 맵에서 거미알 중 하운드를 꺼내줌. 다시 데이비드와 대화. 보스전을 깬 후 데이비드와 대화. 아르젠타에게 보고.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Don't be jealous of me even if I become a lady Argenta's great knight. The world is unfair. Heh.
(Adventurer David is stuck in his big dream.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Did lady Argenta already fall in love with me? Ha... My charm is irresistable. Heh. Heh. Heh.
(You need to obtain the Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins to proceed)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Did lady Argenta already fall in love with me? Ha... My charm is irresistable. Heh. Heh. Heh.
(You need to obtain the Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins to proceed)

$Argenta$
Feels like I am doing all the work for you, weakling..
This is making me hungry.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then I will go to Death Basin first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Go bring me the Poison Sac one more time.
Since now you know the Poison Sac is in Death Basin, you will be faster this time round, right?
<html>$Charlatan's Crisis$</html>

$Argenta$
Remember, do not make me worry about you. And come back as soon as you collected it
You are wasting so much time on such simple job.

$Argenta$
You don't even need a companion for this job.
I'm not gonna ask you to kidnap the dragon. Just do it alone!

(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

$Argenta$
Commanding weakling like you non-stop makes me hungry!
Don't you think so?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then I will go to Death Basin first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Go bring me the Poison Sac one more time.
Since now you know the Poison Sac is in Death Basin, you will be faster this time round, right?
<html>$Charlatan's Crisis$</html>

$Argenta$
Remember, do not make me worry about you. And come back as soon as you collected it
You are wasting so much time on such simple job.

$Argenta$
You don't even need a companion for this job.
I'm not gonna ask you to kidnap the dragon. Just do it alone!

(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Don't be jealous of me even if I become a lady Argenta's personal knight.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Don't be jealous of me even if I become a lady Argenta's personal knight.

$Argenta$
Remember, do not make me worry about you. And come back as soon as you collected it
You are wasting so much time on such simple job.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. You are head towards Death Basin, aren't you? While you are talking to Argenta, I have gotten another request! I can easily handle two requests at the same time! Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Watch and learn from me! Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David arrogance is getting worst)

$Adventurer David$
What? This is a crisis! How did I make such a mistake! This is dream! This is dream! uhhh...
(Adventurer David's eyes are filled with tears.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You are the one who's about to cry...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Oh! {user_nick}!! Wel... Well met. I will give you the opportunity to help me, Great Adventurer David, just by a little. Are you about to cry? Did you feel that honored? Ha. Stop crying, and listen to my story carefully.

$Adventurer David$
Actually, I received a request. The job requires me to bring one Hound along with me. I can finish this really easily but some days are just not our good days you know...

$Adventurer David$
But… sadly, the Hound fell and got trapped in Spider Eggs. *Sigh*... This is not happening.
So why don't you go and rescue the Hound for me? Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Hmm ... So are up to the job? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Take it as you are doing me a favor then... Ah, Ahem! Be honur that you have a chance to carry out missions from me, the great adventurer! Sheesh.

$Adventurer David$
Do you see those Spider Eggs next to me?
Heh, There is no way that you can't see the Spider Eggs even if you are a just a Newbie. Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Let me finish, listen up! My Hound is in the Spider Egg out of those Spider Eggs. I don't know what's in the other Spider Eggs! Ha... Did you finally understand why I didn't know what to do?

$Adventurer$
No... I wasn't scared. H... Heh. Heh. Heh. I have got nothing to say to weakling like you. Anyway... Do me a favor to break that Spider Egg.
(Adventurer David's voice is trembling. He seems like he is really scared.)

$Adventurer David$
Can you see those Spider Eggs? The one has my Hound. So now, go rescue my Hound!
(Adventurer David is sweating but still bluffing himself.)

$Adventurer David$
Can you see those Spider Eggs? The one has my Hound. So now, go rescue my Hound!
(Adventurer David is sweating but still bluffing himself.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You didn't even help me at all...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. Newbies like you could complete such mission smoothly partly because of my Perfect Escort! Heh. Heh. Heh

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (Seems to be thinking of running away with the speed of lightning) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Although you are complaining. I know you are deeply grateful to my Lightning Escort Skill from your heart. Heh. Heh. Heh. I will join you again after I safely escort these Hounds to a safe place!!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Don't be scared while I'm away, I will be back as soon as I can to Protect you! Ha. Ha. Ha.
(Adventurer David seems to be back to his old arrogant self.)

$Adventurer David${action:talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. Newbie {user_nick}… Can't even stand still against silly Scarlet Scythe Reaper. I would've helped you if you could have not beat it, but I gave the chance to experience it instead! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Um… Poison Sac? Where did you get this?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
I am giving you this only because I pity you for trying so hard for a weak adventurer! No... Not because of the Hound incident. Don't get full of your self! Hmph.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Money to start business. Who are you going to sell to?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Showing interest as I expected. Do you really think I would reveal you my business secret? Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Only Argenta has shown the interest.. So far!! But pioneer always feel lonely! I pity you for not even knowing that! Heh. See you later!!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. I know getting those Poison Sac from me, make you want to cry. But don't cry and go see Argenta already. Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David staring at empty sky)

$Argenta$
What is this!! You are making me worried about you by returning later and later each time. You are doing this on purpose, right?

$Argenta$
You are not allowed to die or even get injured until I find a replacement slave, heard that? Now, give me what you have for me.

$Argenta$
You are always performing below my expectation. How can this be enough?
(Argenta glup down the Poison Sac)

$Argenta$
What? Don't bother worry about me when you can't even take good care of yourself.

$Argenta$
No, just that as my slave you are not allowed to get injured without my permission.
Ah, you talk too much. Annoying.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
I'm starting to get sick of you, slave. I can't always be here and waiting for you. {user_nick}, go and get ready to go to Saint Haven.
(Next quest is available at level 22 or higher)

$Adventurer David$
Did Argenta praise my excellent skill?! Heh… Tell her that his is nothing for Adventurer David!! Okay? Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David's is starting to make no sense)

journal.title: Argenta's request
journal.contents:
Argentahas requested for Poison Sac, once again. Try to find a way to find it at Death Basin.
(Quest cannot be completed in party status)

Lower Ridge (Forest of Death Entrance) → Death Basin
journal.destination: (Solo) Collect Poison Sac from Death Basin

journal.title: Desperate Adventurer David
journal.contents:
During Hound escorting request,Adventurer David a Hound got trapped inside a spider egg. Let's find Adventurer David next to a spider egg and get Hound pulled out of the egg.

Lower Ridge (Forest of Death Entrance) → Death Basin
journal.destination: Destroy spider egg to save Hound
journal.todo_msg: Rescue Hound from the spider egg next to Adventurer David

journal.title: Successfully rescue Hound
journal.contents:
Rescue trapped Hound. Talk to Adventurer David again.

Death Basin → Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: Hound Rescued. Please go talk to Adventurer David.

journal.title: Found another Poison Sac
journal.contents:
After helping Adventurer David, he disappeared without even saying thank you. Let's go forward to find another Poison Sac.

Lower Ridge (Forest of Death Entrance) → Death Basin
journal.destination: Collect Poison Sac from Death Basin
journal.todo_msg: Move forward to find another Poison Sac

journal.title: Adventurer David's reward
journal.contents:
Adventurer David has appeared again after Hound delivery. He looks like he has something to say.

Death Basin → Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Adventurer David.

journal.title: Poison Sac receive
journal.contents:
Adventurer Davidhas just recieve Poison Sac. Let's go back and report to Argenta about the result.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.todo_msg: Please report to Argenta in Gray Ruins.
